General.Description: Equatorial Maranhão Distribuidora de Energia S.A. provides electricity distribution services in the state of Maranhão. It distributes electricity in a concession area of 331,937 kilometre square in 217 municipalities. The company was formerly known as Companhia Energética do Maranhão " CEMAR and changed it to Equatorial Maranhão Distribuidora de Energia S.A. in September 2019. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in São Luís, Brazil. Equatorial Maranhão Distribuidora de Energia S.A. is a subsidiary of Equatorial Energia Distribuição SA.
General.Address: Alameda A, São Luís, MA, Brazil, 65070-900
